product_name: adidas Terrex Swift Cocona Hoodie - Women's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: What's not to love about the women's adidas Terrex Swift Cocona Hoodie? It uses natural Cocona(R) activated carbon from coconuts to manage odor, block UV rays and cool you down as you heat up. Cocona(R) fibers are fused into the polyester fibers to improve overall wicking, breathability, warmth, odor absorption and UV protection. Sweat is moved off the skin to evaporate quickly, so you stay cooler as you work hard. UPF 50+ rating. Asymmetrical center-front zipper placement. The adidas Terrex Swift Cocona Hoodie for women has zippered hand pockets. Overstock.
